"かすかに覚えし桃色の花":
"Dear <%me>,
I'm sorry but could I ask another favor?
The orange flowers you brought were
wonderful but next time you see the Nab
Rappies on Naberius, would you please
collect some pink flowers?

I can't leave to get them and they
could really help with Maoti's recovery.
※Cae de Nv.10+ Nab Rappies."
